${ModID}:ValorForm.NAME: Valor Form
DESCRIPTION: Every attack played draws #b1 card. NL Costs #b2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:WisdomForm.NAME: Wisdom Form
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card gain 2 #yBlock. NL Costs #b2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:MasterForm.NAME: Master Form
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain #b2 #yBlock. If the card played is an attack, draw #b1 card. NL Costs #b4 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:FinalForm.NAME: Final Form
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b6 #yThorns, gain half #yDrive #yPoints instead of none. NL Choose any number of cards to #yRetain. NL Whenever you play a card, gain #b2 #yBlock. If the card played is an attack, draw #b1 card NL Costs #b6 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:AntiForm.NAME: Anti Form
DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 #yStrength. NL At the beginning of each turn gain #yHades #yCurse and #b1 #yIntangible. NL You are stuck in this form until the end of combat.
